content: chain left to work in 5 sts step 3 work all 6 stitches into the last chain in the last chain make 2 double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet and 2 double_crochet 6 sts step 4 start working on the opposite side of the leaf you should have 5 chain s left to work in make 1 double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet and 1 slip_stitch 5 sts *fasten_off and sew the leaves to the dirt flower pink row 1 chain 32 start in the second chain from the hook make a slip_stitch in the first st then repeat 3 double_crochet in the first chain followed by 1 slip_stitch in the next chain 45 sts *fasten_off and weave the yarn through the flower to secure it then sew it to the dirt link to video https //youtu be/2umpc5yjccq if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
